text:
We can talk about the time passed,
Or we can talk about how far we have come. 

Lottie ©

author: Lottie - c a lovejoy 🦋
text:
Hope is essential in any situation.
But you cannot stay in that energy.
At some point you have to take the leap, feet first straight into faith. 
That is the place change occurs.
That is the place miracles happen. 

Lottie ©

author: Lottie - c a lovejoy 🦋
text:
I think it's about having a life you don't want to run away from. 
It's about never dimming your light to fit into other people's worlds.
Creating the life you choose by shining bright. Not trying to escape it because you can't be yourself. 
Live fearlessly.
Be you.

Lottie © https://t.co/3n9eXDJaC8

text: Some people want your love and attention without giving anything back. Be mindful of how much energy you put in to these people. Pull back and put your attention back onto yourself, you will then see your own life flourish and you'll understand that 'attention' is their issue.

text:
Sometimes we have to understand that we are not going to get the answers that we need or the explanation we deserve. 

We will always have people that refuse to give closure. That's their karma, and it's not your job to worry about that.
